description: introducing the basic concepts of the game

dialog.speaker: alien-left
dialog.msg: Glarf, our energy tank is dry as a Martini. We need more power to make it to the concert.

dialog.speaker: alien-right
dialog.msg: What we need, Blirg, is a cheap alternative energy source - shope.

dialog.speaker: alien-left
dialog.msg: Shope? I think you mean sheep.

dialog.speaker: alien-right
dialog.msg: I'm pretty sure the plural is shope. Here - I programmed this shope-doge to direct the shope on to our shipe.

dialog.speaker: none
dialog.msg: The sheep are teleported through a portal. The dog will redirect them.
